name: The Asteroid Belt's Trial
description: Welcome to the Asteroid Belt's Trial! In this game you are an intergalactic space traveler caught in the middle of an asteroid field, who must avoid and destroy the meteors that come into orbit in order to make your way home. Inspired by old-school arcade space shooters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Dualcore Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better Storage: 100 MB available space
